issue.message: This method should be called `getMediaItem` such that `mediaItem` can be accessed as a property from Kotlin; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#property-prefixes
Unknown nullability; explicitly declare as `@Nullable` or `@NonNull` to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://developer.android.com/kotlin/interop#nullability_annotations
